title: Inception
description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform an inception.
comment: A mind-blowing journey into dreams within dreams.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest psychological and physical tests when the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham.
comment: One of the most iconic portrayals of a superhero and a villain.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
comment: A visually stunning and emotionally charged space epic.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
comment: A groundbreaking film that questions reality and perception.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
comment: A powerful story of hope and resilience.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
comment: A cult classic with unforgettable characters and dialogue.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.
comment: A heartwarming tale that explores the human experience.

title: The Godfather
description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
comment: A masterpiece of storytelling and character development.

title: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.
comment: A provocative exploration of identity and consumerism.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A meek hobbit of the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.
comment: An epic tale of friendship, courage, and sacrifice.
